verses.esv:
5   Let the wise hear and increase in learning,
    and the one who understands obtain guidance,
verses.kjv: 5 A wise man will hear, and will increase learning; and a man of understanding shall attain unto wise counsels:
verses.niv: 5 let the wise listen and add to their learning, and let the discerning get guidance-

verses.esv:
15   An intelligent heart acquires knowledge,
    and the ear of the wise seeks knowledge.
verses.kjv: 15 The heart of the prudent getteth knowledge; and the ear of the wise seeketh knowledge.
verses.niv: 15 The heart of the discerning acquires knowledge; the ears of the wise seek it out.

verses.esv:
9   Give instruction to a wise man, and he will be still wiser;
    teach a righteous man, and he will increase in learning.
verses.kjv: 9 Give instruction to a wise man, and he will be yet wiser: teach a just man, and he will increase in learning.
verses.niv: 9 Instruct a wise man and he will be wiser still; teach a righteous man and he will add to his learning.

verses.esv:
7   The fear of the LORD is the beginning of knowledge;
    fools despise wisdom and instruction.
verses.kjv: 7 The fear of the LORD is the beginning of knowledge: but fools despise wisdom and instruction.
verses.niv: 7 The fear of the Lord is the beginning of knowledge, but fools despise wisdom and discipline.

verses.esv: 16 All Scripture is breathed out by God and profitable for teaching, for reproof, for correction, and for training in righteousness,
verses.kjv: 16 All scripture is given by inspiration of God, and is profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness:
verses.niv: 16 All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness,

verses.esv: 9 What you have learned and received and heard and seen in me—practice these things, and the God of peace will be with you.
verses.kjv: 9 Those things, which ye have both learned, and received, and heard, and seen in me, do: and the God of peace shall be with you.
verses.niv: 9 Whatever you have learned or received or heard from me, or seen in me--put it into practice. And the God of peace will be with you.

verses.esv: 2:1 But as for you, teach what accords with sound doctrine.
verses.kjv: 1 But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine:
verses.niv: 1 You must teach what is in accord with sound doctrine.

verses.esv: 15 Do your best to present yourself to God as one approved, a worker who has no need to be ashamed, rightly handling the word of truth.
verses.kjv: 15 Study to shew thyself approved unto God, a workman that needeth not to be ashamed, rightly dividing the word of truth.
verses.niv: 15 Do your best to present yourself to God as one approved, a workman who does not need to be ashamed and who correctly handles the word of truth.

verses.esv: 4 For whatever was written in former days was written for our instruction, that through endurance and through the encouragement of the Scriptures we might have hope.
verses.kjv: 4 For whatsoever things were written aforetime were written for our learning, that we through patience and comfort of the scriptures might have hope.
verses.niv: 4 For everything that was written in the past was written to teach us, so that through endurance and the encouragement of the Scriptures we might have hope.

verses.esv:
6   Train up a child in the way he should go;
    even when he is old he will not depart from it.
verses.kjv: 6 Train up a child in the way he should go: and when he is old, he will not depart from it.
verses.niv: 6 Train a child in the way he should go, and when he is old he will not turn from it.

verses.esv: 16 All Scripture is breathed out by God and profitable for teaching, for reproof, for correction, and for training in righteousness, 17 that the man of God may be complete, equipped for every good work.
verses.kjv: 16 All scripture is given by inspiration of God, and is profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness: 17 That the man of God may be perfect, throughly furnished unto all good works.
verses.niv: 16 All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness, 17 so that the man of God may be thoroughly equipped for every good work.

verses.esv: 7 always learning and never able to arrive at a knowledge of the truth.
verses.kjv: 7 Ever learning, and never able to come to the knowledge of the truth.
verses.niv: 7 always learning but never able to acknowledge the truth.

verses.esv: 16 Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly, teaching and admonishing one another in all wisdom, singing psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, with thankfulness in your hearts to God.
verses.kjv: 16 Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.
verses.niv: 16 Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly as you teach and admonish one another with all wisdom, and as you sing psalms, hymns and spiritual songs with gratitude in your hearts to God.

verses.esv:
4   Make me to know your ways, O LORD;
    teach me your paths.
verses.kjv: 4 Shew me thy ways, O LORD; teach me thy paths.
verses.niv: 4 Show me your ways, O LORD, teach me your paths;

verses.kjv: 9 Whosoever transgresseth, and abideth not in the doctrine of Christ, hath not God. He that abideth in the doctrine of Christ, he hath both the Father and the Son.
verses.niv: 1 The elder,

verses.esv:
8   I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go;
    I will counsel you with my eye upon you.
verses.kjv: 8 I will instruct thee and teach thee in the way which thou shalt go: I will guide thee with mine eye.
verses.niv: 8 I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go; I will counsel you and watch over you.

verses.esv:
17   Whoever heeds instruction is on the path to life,
    but he who rejects reproof leads others astray.
verses.kjv: 17 He is in the way of life that keepeth instruction: but he that refuseth reproof erreth.
verses.niv: 17 He who heeds discipline shows the way to life, but whoever ignores correction leads others astray.

verses.esv: 52 And Jesus increased in wisdom and in stature and in favor with God and man.
verses.kjv: 52 And Jesus increased in wisdom and stature, and in favour with God and man.
verses.niv: 52 And Jesus grew in wisdom and stature, and in favor with God and men.

verses.esv: 5 If any of you lacks wisdom, let him ask God, who gives generously to all without reproach, and it will be given him.
verses.kjv: 5 If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally, and upbraideth not; and it shall be given him.
verses.niv: 5 If any of you lacks wisdom, he should ask God, who gives generously to all without finding fault, and it will be given to him.

verses.esv: 8 See to it that no one takes you captive by philosophy and empty deceit, according to human tradition, according to the elemental spirits of the world, and not according to Christ.
verses.kjv: 8 Beware lest any man spoil you through philosophy and vain deceit, after the tradition of men, after the rudiments of the world, and not after Christ.
verses.niv: 8 See to it that no one takes you captive through hollow and deceptive philosophy, which depends on human tradition and the basic principles of this world rather than on Christ.

verses.esv: 19 Go therefore and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, 20 teaching them to observe all that I have commanded you. And behold, I am with you always, to the end of the age.”
verses.kjv: 19 Go ye therefore, and teach all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost: 20 Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you: and, lo, I am with you alway, even unto the end of the world. Amen.
verses.niv: 19 Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, 20 and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

verses.esv: 26 But the Helper, the Holy Spirit, whom the Father will send in my name, he will teach you all things and bring to your remembrance all that I have said to you.
verses.kjv: 26 But the Comforter, which is the Holy Ghost, whom the Father will send in my name, he shall teach you all things, and bring all things to your remembrance, whatsoever I have said unto you.
verses.niv: 26 But the Counselor, the Holy Spirit, whom the Father will send in my name, will teach you all things and will remind you of everything I have said to you.

verses.esv: 27 But the anointing that you received from him abides in you, and you have no need that anyone should teach you. But as his anointing teaches you about everything, and is true, and is no lie—just as it has taught you, abide in him.
verses.kjv: 27 But the anointing which ye have received of him abideth in you, and ye need not that any man teach you: but as the same anointing teacheth you of all things, and is truth, and is no lie, and even as it hath taught you, ye shall abide in him.
verses.niv: 27 As for you, the anointing you received from him remains in you, and you do not need anyone to teach you. But as his anointing teaches you about all things and as that anointing is real, not counterfeit--just as it has taught you, remain in him.

verses.esv: 17 As for these four youths, God gave them learning and skill in all literature and wisdom, and Daniel had understanding in all visions and dreams.
verses.kjv: 17 As for these four children, God gave them knowledge and skill in all learning and wisdom: and Daniel had understanding in all visions and dreams.
verses.niv: 17 To these four young men God gave knowledge and understanding of all kinds of literature and learning. And Daniel could understand visions and dreams of all kinds.

verses.esv: 29 Take my yoke upon you, and learn from me, for I am gentle and lowly in heart, and you will find rest for your souls.
verses.kjv: 29 Take my yoke upon you, and learn of me; for I am meek and lowly in heart: and ye shall find rest unto your souls.
verses.niv: 29 Take my yoke upon you and learn from me, for I am gentle and humble in heart, and you will find rest for your souls.
